FuncDef:
The esqm session aging-time sctp command is used to configure the aging time of SCTP session.
The undo esqm session aging-time sctp command is used to recover the default aging time of SCTP session.
By default, after ESQM is enabled on a device, the default value of aging time is 300s.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures the aging time value.
The value is an integer that ranges from 60 to 300.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After ESQM is enabled on a device, the default aging time of SCTP session is 300s, use this command to configure a shorter time.
